attributes.action: Instruct DWP doctors to inform claimants the name of the condition or disability they are suffering from
attributes.additional_details:
Some claimants  of Incapacity Benefit do not get told the name of their disability.
Please set up a special team of DWP/Job Centre   Disability Employment Advisers  to interview every long term Incapacity Benefit claimant  and find out  what additional support can be given to assist them to find employment.
Please consider paying compensation to Incapacity Benefit claimants for whom  the Job Centre  has failed to give them any help.
